sense.def:
Pri dokazu ali razčlenitvi, ki je
logical
, je vsaka trditev resnična, če je prejšnja trditev resnična.

seg.quote: I made little attempt at logical argument.
Everything has to be logically analysed.

sense.def:
Sklep ali rezultat, ki je
logical
, je edini, ki je po logiki možen.

seg.quote: There is only one logical conclusion.
To him violence was a logical inevitability.
It follows logically that one of them is lying.

sense.def:
Potek dogodkov, ki je
logical
, je v danih okoliščinah videti razumen ali pameten.

seg.quote: Wouldn't it have been more logical for them to make the arrest downstairs?
Therefore, logically, he had to go.
